http://www.skepticalaboutskeptics.org/examining-skeptics/editorial-suppressed-science-on-skeptics/

"Skeptics, both of the genuine and the pseudo variety, have elevated this double standard to a principle of science: extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence! But this principle does not hold up to logical scrutiny, because a claim is only ordinary or extraordinary in relation to a theory."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Problem with Extraordinary Claims Requiring Extraordinary Evidence
